snippet.title: Amaranthine Voyage: The Living Mountain
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1xSoxak
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1oHmIZQ

Try this immersive, high-quality game for FREE! Then continue on with a ONE TIME unlock and play offline! 
NO VIRTUAL ITEMS, NO INTERRUPTIONS... you'll OWN this game for life. 

One of your students, Jonathan, has disappeared through a portal, confirming your belief in other worlds. You're the only one who can follow him and find the truth. Explore worlds and meet fascinating characters, including a dashing king. 

• DISCOVER A PORTAL TO ANOTHER WORLD! 
Nathan vanished from the town of Three Stones. Since that happened the townfolk have been haunted by many strange occurrences. Explore the town a find out if it is indeed a doorway to other lands. 

• GET TO KNOW BONNIE THE BEAGLE 
Shortly after Jonathan went missing, Bonnie also disappeared. Find her on your journey and she'll be able to assist you with your tasks. 

• GO ON ANOTHER ADVENTURE IN THE BONUS GAME! 
Unlock an epic journey in this lovely Collector's Edition. Find collectables and enjoy beautiful wallpapers and concept art. 

• DOES THE TIARA FIT? 
Your world has grown skeptical of your work. Could it be that another home, with a king, suits you better? Find out in this charming Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure. 

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
